text: Ara madayanabasira nikata tadera bha'i so'a'ibake. Tini balalena -- ''he amara sampradaya! Allahâ€Œra upasana karo, tomadera jan'ya tini chara an'ya upasya ne'i. Ara mape o ojane kama kara na, nihsandeha ami tomadera dekhachi samrd'dhisali, ara ami niscaya'i tomadera jan'ya asanka karachi eka sarbagrasi dinera sastira.
